name: Great Guns
overview:
Great Guns was produced by Stern Electronics in 1983.

Stern Electronics released 66 different machines under this trade name, starting in 1977.

Other machines made by Stern Electronics during the time period Great Guns was produced include Great Guns, Lost Tomb, Mazer Blazer, Cliff Hanger, Minefield, Pooyan, Orbitor 1, Cue, Rescue, and Hypnox.

A game of shooting. Contains many different levels including circus, prehistoric, and wizard scenes. Targets move and both players aim their guns at the screen and shoot.
